Series.Actors: |Arj Barker|Bil Dwyer|Bill Nye|Brad Wollack|Carmen Electra|Donna D'Errico|Heidi Mark|Jason Sklar|Mark Beiro|Randy Sklar|Sean Salisbury|Tim Green|Tony Rock|Traci Bingham|
Series.Overview: Remote-controlled, armored and weaponized machines called BattleBots figth to the death in an arena called the BattleBox. The purpose of the fight is for one robot, or "bot", to dominate or disable the other.

Episode.EpisodeName: BattleBots Beginnings
Las Vegas 1999
Ziggo vs. Missing Link, Mauler vs Nightmare, Overkill vs Frenzy
Voltarc vs. Bender, Killerhurtz vs. Knome II, Minion vs Gray Matter
Episode.Overview: Voltarc, Killerhurtz and Minion advance to the next round. Voltarc dominates Bender by removing his caster wheel and rendering his large blade useless. Killerhurtz leaves Knome II headless and beaten while Minion loses his sawblade but still takes the win.

Episode.EpisodeName: Pressure Drop vs. S.T.C.W.R., Mouser Mecha Catbot vs. Shaft, Vlad the Impaler vs. Tazbot
Episode.Overview: Pressure Drop, Mouser Mecha Catbot and Vlad the Impaler move on to the next round.

Episode.EpisodeName: Backlash vs Crusher, Blade Runner vs Bad Attitude, Grendel vs Diesector
Dooall vs S.L.A.M. , Biohazard vs Mjollnir, Lightweight Rumble
Episode.Overview: Dooall and Biohazard advance; carnage ensues in a free-for-all rumble in the Lightweight division.

Episode.EpisodeName: Voltarc vs Biohazard, Rammstein vs Mechadon, Alpha Raptor vs Tentomushi
Episode.Overview: Voltarc, Rammstein and Alpha Raptor advance.

Episode.EpisodeName: Deadblow vs Alien Gladiator, Pressure Drop vs Ankle Biter, Minion vs Grendel
Episode.Overview: Deadblow, Pressure Drop and Minion go through.

Episode.EpisodeName: Alpha Raptor vs Mouser Mecha Catbot, Backlash vs Das Bot, Backlash vs Alpha Raptor (Lightweight Finals)
Episode.Overview: Alpha Raptor and Backlash advance; Backlash defeats Alpha Raptor to become the Battlebots Season 1.0 Lightweight Champion.

Episode.EpisodeName: Spin Orbiting Force vs Blade Runner, Hazard vs Turtle Road Kill, Ronin vs Ginsu
Episode.Overview: Spin Orbiting Force, Hazard, and Ronin advance.

Episode.EpisodeName: Vlad the Impaler vs Overkill, Punjar vs Gammatron, Killerhurtz vs Mauler
Episode.Overview: Vlad the Impaler, Punjar, and Killerhurtz move on.

Episode.EpisodeName: Vlad the Impaler vs Punjar, Deadblow vs Pressure Drop, Minion vs Rammstein
Episode.Overview: Vlad the Impaler, Deadblow and Minion continue on.

Episode.EpisodeName: Spin Orbiting Force vs Hazard, Killerhurtz vs Voltarc, Ronin vs Dooall
Episode.Overview: Hazard, Voltarc and Dooall move on.

Episode.EpisodeName: Hazard vs Deadblow, Vlad the Impaler vs Voltarc, Minion vs Dooall
Episode.Overview: Hazard takes the Middleweight Championship, Vlad the Impaler wins the Heavyweight nut and Minion takes down Dooall to win its division championship.

Episode.EpisodeName: Remaining Rumbles
Episode.Overview: Remaining weight classes have a free-for-all rumble.

Episode.EpisodeName: Tentomoushi vs. Evil Fish Tank
Mauler 5150 vs. Bigger Brother, Snake vs. War Machine, Toe Crusher vs. No Tolerance III
Episode.Overview: Episode 201 H1: Mauler 5150 vs. Bigger Brother Snake vs. War Machine Toe Crusher vs. No Tolerance III
